file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  title: Papermill Jupyter Report
  version: "1.1.0"
paths:
  /:
    get:
      summary: Display a form to generate a report
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Form to generate a report
          content:
            application/html:
              schema:
                type: string
    post:
      description: Callback for the template generation form
      responses:
        "201":
          description: The generated report
          content:
            application/html:
              schema:
                type: string
        "500":
          description: Error at report generation
          content:
            application/html:
              schema:
                type: string
  /{templatePath}:
    get:
      summary: Generate the report
      parameters:
        - name: templatePath
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Notebook path (should end with .ipynb)
          schema:
            type: string
          example: subfolder/simple_execute.ipynb
        - name: variable
          in: query
          description: name=value to be passed to the report template
          schema:
            type: string
          example: msg=hello&a=11
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The generated report
          content:
            application/html:
              schema:
                type: string
        "404":
          description: Template not found
          content:
            application/html:
              schema:
                type: string
        "500":
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/html:
              schema:
                type: string
  /api/templates/:
    get:
      summary: List all report templates
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The list of available report templates
          content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  type: object
                  additionalProperties: false
                  properties:
                    templates:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        type: object
                        additionalProperties: false
                        properties:
                          path:
                            type: string
                          parameters:
                            type: array
                            items:
                              type: object
                              additionalProperties: false
                              properties:
                                name:
                                  type: string
                                  description: Parameter name
                                inferred_type_name:
                                  type: string
                                  description: Parameter inferred type
                                default:
                                  type: string
                                  description: Default parameter value
                                help:
                                  type: string
                                  description: Parameter help
                  example:
                    {
                     "templates": [
                        {
                          "path": "broken_parameters.ipynb",
                          "parameters": [
                            {
                              "name": "msg",
                              "inferred_type_name": "None",
                              "default": "None",
                              "help": ""
                            },
                            {
                              "name": "a",
                              "inferred_type_name": "float",
                              "default": "2.25",
                              "help": "Variable a"
                            },
                            {
                              "name": "b",
                              "inferred_type_name": "List[str]",
                              "default": "['Hello','World']",
                              "help": "Nice list"
                            }
                          ]
                        },
                        {
                          "path": "no_parameters.ipynb",
                          "parameters": []
                        },
                        {
                          "path": "subfolder/simple_execute.ipynb",
                          "parameters": [
                            {
                              "name": "msg",
                              "inferred_type_name": "None",
                              "default": "None",
                              "help": ""
                            }
                          ]
                        }
                      ]
                    }

Error: notImplemented: path "/": get: responses: 200: contents: unsupported content types: [application/html]
